snippet.title: POOLS - Trailer
snippet.description:
POOLS OUT NOW !!!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2663530?utm_source=youtube
Website: https://poolsthegame.com
Patreon: https://patreon.com/Tensori
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/s3KMR2xZdY
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tensori.fi/
X: https://twitter.com/Tensori_ltd

Music by:
- Mikko Tarmia (first "ambient" part)
- Erik Nyholm (last "intense" part)
- Beginning is "Background music tropical house. Funny dance music for short video" by White_Records from Pixabay

Experimental exploration game that emphasizes on psychological horror and immersive, weird, eerie feeling of liminal spaces instead of excessive monster chasing scenes or jumpscares.

An endless maze of haunting pool rooms awaits to be explored. Unlike the overt terror of SCP, Amnesia or Outlast, Pools emphasizes an atmospheric adventure through the veiled mysteries of liminal spaces, where the known and the unknown coalesce.
